doc.title: 33 Brompton Place
doc.plot: Three beautiful women occupy the penthouse apartment at 33 Brompton Place in the ritzy Near North Side of Chicago. Patricia is a middle management editor for Foxxx Magazine, an upscale men's publication in the "Playboy" tradition. Robin works as a public relations councilor but the job is a front for her real occupation as an industrial spy. Tony comes to Chicago from the city of Kitchener in Ontario with hopes of becoming a model. The loves, adventures and careers of these lovely women form the plot of "33 Brompton Place".

Three beautiful women occupy the penthouse apartment at 33 Brompton Place in the ritzy Near North Side of Chicago. Patricia is a middle management editor for Foxxx Magazine, an upscale men's publication in the "Playboy" tradition. Robin works as a public relations councilor but the job is a front for her real occupation as an industrial spy. Tony comes to Chicago from the city of Kitchener in Ontario with hopes of becoming a model. The loves, adventures and careers of these lovely women form the plot of "33 Brompton Place".
